summary: This document outlines the implementation of the 2021 Cost Reimbursement Program (CRP) by T-Mobile, which modifies the reimbursement rates for services provided in response to legal demands from government entities. It emphasizes T-Mobile's commitment to its relationship with government agencies and provides contact information for inquiries related to the program.
keyFacts: The 2021 Cost Reimbursement Program (CRP) will be effective for legal demands received on or after January 1, 2021.
T-Mobile has simplified and/or reduced the overall average cost of the reimbursement rates.
The document includes contact information for inquiries related to the CRP and specific invoices.
